
Memories In The Snow

# BITSY VERSION 4.3

! ROOM_FORMAT 1

POS 1 9,7

SPR a
00001100
00011100

01110000

00011100

DLG SPR_0
POS 1 6,8

SPR b
00000000
00111110
00111110
00111110
00100010
00100010
00000000
00000000
DLG SPR_1
POS 2 3,8

ITM 0
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
NAME snow
DLG ITM_0

ITM 1
00000000
00000000
00000000
00110000
01001000
00000000
00000000
00000000
NAME bauble01
DLG ITM_1

ITM 2
00000000
00000000
00001100
00010010
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
NAME bauble02
DLG ITM_2

ITM 3
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00110000
01001000
00000000
NAME bauble03
DLG ITM_3

ITM 4
00000000
00000000
00000000
00011000
00100100
00000000
00000000
00000000
NAME bauble04
DLG ITM_4

ITM 5
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
NAME far_snow

DLG SPR_0
"""
{
  - granny == 2 ?
    Thanks again for helping me out, {shuffle
      - little one
      - little bird
      - my honeybun
    }!
    Now run along back to town.
  - {item "bauble01" AND item "bauble02" AND item "bauble03" AND item "bauble04"} == 1 ?
    You're back!
    
    And you have your Grandad's things!
    You're the best grandkid an old woman could ask for.{granny = 2}
  - granny == 0 ?
    Hello there, {shuffle
      - little one
      - little bird
      - my honeybun
    }!
    
    It's good to see you again...
    
    {shuffle
      - You've grown up so much...
      - You always make me smile...
    }
    
    I can see so much of your {shuffle
      - Mother
      - Father
      - Grandad
    } in you...
    Say... Do you have the time to help your ole Grann-Grann before you leave?
    
    I dropped a bag full of your Grandad's old {shuffle
      - knick-knacks
      - trinkets
      - thingums
    } when I was heading back to the house today. They are back down the road a bit... 
    
    But if you wouldn't mind grabbing them for me... I'd be ever so grateful!
    
    I'd get out myself, but I'm afraid it's too dark and too snowy for me.
    
    Thank you, {shuffle
      - little one
      - little bird
      - my honeybun
    }! {granny = 1}

  - granny == 1 ?
    {shuffle
      - Hello again, deary.
      - Are you planning to get your Grandad's things before you head back to town?
      - Yes, my dear?
      - I'm afraid I don't have any cookies for you today.
      - Just thinking about all of your Grandad's old knick-knacks getting wet in the snow makes me sad.
      - Back in my day, it snowed like this everyday.
      - You're welcome to warm up by the fire!
    }

}
"""

DLG ITM_0
"""
{
  - {item "snow"} == 49 ?
    Well, there we go...

}{
  - {item "snow"} == 49 ?
    Nothing like ruining a perfectly good snowy field with footprints!
}
"""

DLG SPR_1
"""
<-----<<
Town this way.
"""

DLG ITM_1
"""
{shuffle
  - An old sock
  - A rusty belt buckle
  - An old pair of jeans
  - A small iron chain necklace
  - A scuffed up pocket watch
  - A tattered necktie
  - A colorful shirt
  - A set of well-worn suspenders
}... I guess grandpa used to wear this.
"""

DLG ITM_2
"""
This looks like {shuffle
  - an old picture frame... but I can't make out the faces.
  - a rusty pocket knife. Grandpa was pretty good at whittling small tokens.
  - some sort of card game. There are no instructions around.
  - a spoon. I'm not sure of the significance, but my grandpa had over 90 years to get attached to things...
  - a shell casing. Grandpa fought in several wars in his younger years.
  - a small ring. It doesn't look valuable.
}
"""

DLG ITM_3
"""
A little {shuffle
  - sack 
  - satchel 
  - bag 
}containing {shuffle
  - a feather
  - a brass egg
  - a handful of clothes pins
  - a tin lighter
}, {shuffle
  - an old-timey eyeglass frame
  - a half-burnt candle
  - an assortment of exceptionally expired candies
}, and {shuffle
  - an hourglass timer.
  - a glass bead.
  - three small buttons.
  - a few coins from various countries.
}
"""

DLG ITM_4
"""
{shuffle
  - Fishing supplies
  - Woodworking tools
  - Dancing shoes
  - A geology kit
}... My grandpa always loved that.
"""

END 0


END undefined
Goodbye Gran-Gran!

VAR granny
0
